definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to follow/to adhere to/to abide by
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: So a benign cycle, makes, the scale benefits.
sentences.chinese: 以致形成良性循环，薄利多销，向规模要效益。

sentences.english: This virtuous circle was good for business and good for society.
sentences.chinese: 这种良性循环既有益于商业发展也有益于社会。

sentences.english: In most industries such a virtuous circle would be a cause for celebration.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数产业中，这样的良性循环都是值得庆幸的事。

sentences.english: This is a virtuous circle of promotion, everybody taking part wins.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个相互促进的良性循环，参与者都是获益方。

sentences.english: Objective To discover the operation model for EPIs beneficial cycle in a such a long time.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索计划免疫可持续发展的良性循环的运作机制。

sentences.english: It is extremely important to form a good circulation in English teaching in class.
sentences.chinese: 在英语教学课堂教学中形成一个良性循环圈非常重要。

sentences.english: At present, the relationship between the population and the socioeconomics of Changshu is on the stage of benign circulation.
sentences.chinese: 目前常熟人口与社会经济关系已步入良性循环阶段。

sentences.english: The virtuous circle so much praised would be broken.
sentences.chinese: 这种被多加赞扬的良性循环将被打破。

definition: positive (in its effect)/leading to good consequences/virtuous/(medicine) benign (tumor etc)
profitable to both sides/a win-win situation
bad money drives out good money (economics)
pinyin: lie4 bi4 qu1 zhu2 liang2 bi4

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to support one's parents in their old age/to show filial piety/to to repay/to return a favor
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
